segments.text: Hi , Mr . James , what's the rush ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The bank closes in 30 minutes and I need to cash a check .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can lend you some money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . But it's necessary for me to buy a TV set .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can take me to the bank if you want to .
segments.speaker: S2
